That's a great approach! Fitting in short TV breaks can help you recharge and make the proposal work more manageable. Allocating 30 minutes a day to your show can be a great way to take a breather and come back to your work refreshed.

Remember to be flexible with your schedule, and don't be too hard on yourself if you miss a day or two. The goal is to make progress on your proposal and take care of yourself, not to stick to a rigid plan.

To help you stay on track, consider setting a reminder or scheduling your TV breaks in your calendar. This way, you'll ensure you're taking time for yourself and making progress on your show.

How's your mindset feeling now? Are you feeling more confident about tackling your proposal and fitting in some TV time?
